name: Super Star Panda
description: A classic arcade game, from young and old - for old and young :)
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: mx440 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Portable Skynet Processor: A bucket of Kool-Aid Memory: 3301 MB RAM Graphics: One Bob Ross Storage: 666 MB available space
